reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and comfortable, with positive feedback about its quality and wearability, particularly noting how it hangs off the shoulders.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Casual Sheek Look
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I love the way this sweater hangs off of the shoulders. It hangs off my shoulders a little more than the model in the picture, but that's the way I purposely draped it off of my shoulders. The deep V in the back makes this piece a nice peak a boo. Not sure what would be the best undergarment for the sweater since it would expose the bra strap in the back, but it's still so cute. The sweater has a nice weight to it without feeling to heavy. The color was rich. It is not a tight sweater, but it isn't too lose. The stretchiness of the material would make it versatile for women of various sizes. I should have gone down 1 size to make it feel tighter, but once again I like the way it fits on me. Great value for money. Read more
items.author: J. N.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute!
items.body: Very comfortable and great fit! Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and flattering
items.body: Soft and comfortable! Love this sweater! Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice
items.body: Very nice sweater, liked the quality and the brightness of the red . I returned it only because it definitely feels more appropriate for younger ppl. I’m in my 50’s Read more
items.author: dalia robles

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but big
items.author: Leslie P. Gonzalez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect off the shoulder sweater
items.body: These shirts run loose fits, so go down the size. If you want a more tighter fit, but the hang on them is beautiful makes you feel very sexy I got a size M Comfortable material, nice shade of brown Read more
items.author: My world

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pide tu talla correcta
items.body: Es súper elegante el color divino la tela muy calientita rica para esta temporada de frío Read more
items.author: Karla Leiba

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute but needs thought
items.body: I love the idea of this sweater, but its not my vibe. Even when you get your correct size the neck line is too big because the back is so open at the top. I think the knot needs to bea little higher up to just shrink the neck like just a little. Also i got an XS and the sleeves were huge it was falling off shoulder so far you could see my nipple if i didnt have a bra on. Read more
items.author: Heather Barker

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Royal Blue, Black, Coffee, Lvory White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
